name: RunningTimeHelper
0:
”Alexa, open Running Time Helper.”
”nine minutes seven seconds pace for a marathon”
”half at a 8 minutes thirty two seconds pace”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: running time helper
des: Given your average pace time per mile and a race type (e.g. marathon or 5k), this skill will tell you how long it would take for you to finish.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
